889180.name: FPV Air 2 - NightRace DLC
889180.description:
Practice flying in a fresh new set of unique and challenging tracks! The Nightrace Pack includes an assortment of colourful LED infused tracks that let you tear through the dark night sky.

Included Tracks

Carpark

Brave the concrete and learn throttle control in the high stakes environment of an urban carpack.

NightRace

A world-class standard racing track, illuminated in colourful LED's for a trippy race experience

Hollows

Race through the woods at night

Trance

A great track to learn consistant control of your nerves, featuring continuous LED lit tunnels that don't forgive any mistakes

ToTheMoon

A change of scenery, visit the drones that have spun thier way here in a wide open lunar setting

All tracks come with online global leaderboard for tracking fastest laps.
889180.supported_languages:
英语*, 韩语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
